(Then explain this, RYO D, how was he talking to Iron Raptor, hmmm? I 
haven't been able to read my e-mail on the weekend, so sue me, i don't have 
internet directly at home. And it's not like i can READ ALL of the e-mails i 
get. I only have 30 mins to do this stuff, plus i have more important things 
to do. Like School. So don't freak out at me, K? And if your going to be a 
saucy little prick, i just will ignore you! Understand! Just because i made 
a little fowl-up doesn't mean you have to be an ass about it! If you want to 
be rude, so can I!)

Scratch the last post for Shadow Cat, it seems that liono somehow telaported 
from earth and Iron Raptor, to the moon, where he belongs.

*Shadow Cat jogs-up to Iron Raptor, puffing and out of breath, she waves her 
hands about her, wheezing and coughing from running. She finally gives up 
and squats down to re-gain her breath. When she finally has enough breath to 
talk, she stands up and looks at Iron Raptor*

" We have problems galore chief, but i think we can use this one to our 
advantage."
